en.av_c1: Now we are ready to process the record in position 2.
en.av_c2: We will compare it to the record in position 1.
en.av_c3: Since the record in position 2 is smaller, swap them.
en.av_c4: Now compare against the record in position 0.
en.av_c5: Since the record currently in position 1 is not smaller than the one in position 0, we are done with it.
